node.title: 'This makes COVID very real': NT community transmission cases see increase in vaccine bookings
node.alt: People stand outside the COVID-19 vaccine centre at the Italian Club in Marrara.
node.description: The Chief Minister says vaccine clinics are booked out for the weekend "for the first time in a long time" after Greater Darwin was sent into a lockout and Katherine a lockdown following the NT's first case of community transmission.
node.content:
["COVID-19 vaccinations have surged in the Top End\u00a0since the Northern Territory recorded its first case of community transmission on Thursday, with the incident\u00a0being\u00a0labelled a \"wake-up call\"\u00a0for residents\u00a0yet to be fully vaccinated.\u00a0", "Contact tracing is continuing in Darwin and Katherine after one new COVID case, an unvaccinated\u00a055-year-old man,\u00a0was detected in the Northern Territory yesterday.", "The person is a household contact of an\u00a0unvaccinated man in his 20s\u00a0who initially tested positive on Thursday, triggering a snap lockdown in Katherine, and a lockout in Darwin.", "The lockdown in Katherine and lockout in Greater Darwin are scheduled to end at midnight on Sunday.", "Seventy-five\u00a0close contacts\u00a0have been identified so far,\u00a048 of which have been contacted and are in isolation.", "The 27 remaining\u00a0close contacts are\u00a0linked to the Katherine Club exposure site.", "All exposure sites and testing and isolation directions can be found on the NT government's coronavirus\u00a0website.", "On Friday, Chief Minister Michael Gunner said\u00a0vaccination inquiries had spiked across Greater Darwin and Katherine since\u00a0the first case was\u00a0announced.", "", "
The Health Minister\u00a0says more\u00a0staff could be deployed to Top End vaccination clinics to accommodate\u00a0increased\u00a0demand.(ABC News: Che Chorley)
", "He said 500 people had booked in to get vaccinated in just the\u00a0first hour following the announcement and that clinics in Darwin and Palmerston had booked out for the weekend\u00a0\"for the first time in a long time\".", "\"That is the reaction, I guess, when the case is here,\" he said.", "\"One of the things that we've had to combat in the NT \u2026\u00a0[is] we haven't had community transmission, we haven't\u00a0had the trauma of death \u2026\u00a0and they're the things that have driven vaccination rates in other places.", "Appointments were still available, Mr Gunner said,\u00a0in Katherine and at some GPs and pharmacies.", "Palmerston GP Super Clinic chief executive Robyn Cahill on Friday said\u00a0the clinic had been hit by an \"avalanche\" of vaccination appointment inquiries.", "Those inquiries\u00a0included\u00a0many first dose bookings, which she said was a big shift from previous\u00a0few weeks.", "\"We ended up probably doing a couple of hundred people today, whereas we probably were expecting to only do 30 or 40,\" she told ABC Radio Darwin.", "Ms Cahill said\u00a0the restrictions triggered by the new cases appeared to have made the COVID situation\u00a0for unvaccinated Territorians \"suddenly very real\".", "\"When we've talked about messaging in the past, the consequences\u00a0of not being vaccinated \u2026 people have now seen first-hand what that looks like [when] we've never seen that before,\" she said.", "NT Health Minister Natasha Fyles on Friday said the NT government was looking into deploying more health staff\u00a0to Top End vaccination clinics to accommodate\u00a0the increased\u00a0demand.", "
SA, Qld tighten border restrictions with NT
", "Unvaccinated travellers from the NT can not enter\u00a0South Australia unless they are returning residents, the SA government has announced.", "The Queensland government has declared Katherine a hotspot, placing a 14-day hotel quarantine restriction\u00a0on anyone arriving to Queensland\u00a0from the area.", "", "
How to take a rapid antigen test
"]
